scripts.generate: mustache ../../config/testnet-farm.js template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache ../../config/testnet-farm.js src/constants/index.template.ts > src/constants/index.ts && graph codegen
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8021/ --ipfs http://localhost:5002 u2u-amm/f-v3-exchange -l v0.0.1
